.table mother
----
application/datalog

.table father
----
application/datalog

matGramp{child: A, grandfather: C} :-
  mother{child: A, mother: B} & father{child: B, father: C}.
----
application/datalog

father{child: "Mary", father: "Mark"}.
----
application/datalog
eval.step{input: record{rec: father{child: "Mary", father: "Mark"}}, inputMult: 1, node: "1", output: bindings{bindings: {"B": "Mary", "C": "Mark"}}, outputMult: 1, step: 1}.
eval.step{input: record{rec: father{child: "Mary", father: "Mark"}}, inputMult: 1, node: "father", output: record{rec: father{child: "Mary", father: "Mark"}}, outputMult: 1, step: 0}.

mother{child: "Pete", mother: "Mary"}.
----
application/datalog
eval.step{input: bindings{bindings: {"A": "Pete", "B": "Mary", "C": "Mark"}}, inputMult: 1, node: "matGramp", output: record{rec: matGramp{child: "Pete", grandfather: "Mark"}}, outputMult: 1, step: 3}.
eval.step{input: bindings{bindings: {"A": "Pete", "B": "Mary"}}, inputMult: 1, node: "2", output: bindings{bindings: {"A": "Pete", "B": "Mary", "C": "Mark"}}, outputMult: 1, step: 2}.
eval.step{input: record{rec: mother{child: "Pete", mother: "Mary"}}, inputMult: 1, node: "0", output: bindings{bindings: {"A": "Pete", "B": "Mary"}}, outputMult: 1, step: 1}.
eval.step{input: record{rec: mother{child: "Pete", mother: "Mary"}}, inputMult: 1, node: "mother", output: record{rec: mother{child: "Pete", mother: "Mary"}}, outputMult: 1, step: 0}.
